titles.title: Pharmaceutical Origin Transparency Act of 2018
A bill to require manufacturers of drugs to post the names of the countries in which their drugs are manufactured on their internet websites.
Pharmaceutical Origin Transparency Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Pharmaceutical Origin Transparency Act of 2018
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require a drug manufacturer to publish information about each country in which its drugs are manufactured. (A drug is manufactured in a country if the active pharmaceutical ingredient is manufactured in such country.)
